channel.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
channel.description:
Years after the release and soon downfall of DeltaScape (the REAL ONE!) It seemed like the legacy was forgotten, the name wiped from memory, the server base files lost for ever..
Little did I know; All along.. I had the files. *Facepalm* This is what many people shun upon, and almost everyone would say.. "EW Delta!"
I am not here to prove anyone wrong, or say Delta is the better of the bases available.
I am merely here to revive a once #1 spot server. This includes rewriting the core (even though Delta handled 500+; an auto-restarter etc was used to keep the stability.)
And not only the core; But remastering the content within the base itself.
** for those of you wondering, this is NOT the average un-stable, blank, boring deltascape anymore. **
A little side note, I acquired these server files from a friend of mine; Chandler. & We really did put work into it.
One of the best features in-game is a 100% functional (custom idea) Construction.
This base has 19; [u][YES NINETEEN][/u] quests and more coming when I find the time.
Below are some screenshots: (Don't mind the "Dodian Evolved" names, it's what I *was* going to call it.)
Login Screen: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e39aa890ed4a9a8248ae3604a7fd2a7e.png[/img]
Some of the options tab; Toggleable between 317 and 508 features, Auto talker, custom GUI w/ other options including x10 hits toggle, transparent interfaces toggle, & New Hotkeys / old Hotkeys. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/2ce70fa69c24866e62c7559c6677ec45.png[/img]
Good ol' Yanille; and gameframe: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a06cae76e6b04b993f2d58391d78044e.png[/img]
Decent Clan chat system; [img]http://i.gyazo.com/72992de539bb48dfba4ba942ac5f6712.png[/img]
Literally 19 quests and counting! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e973d6376dd91343553dc3f4efe05136.png[/img]
Custom Construction Portal w/ Joining house interface & Locking / unlocking your portal once inside your house.. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/919730fe08d9449f407e648441bccc14.png[/img]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/49af046890fee4a3685e7dd739cd37e9.png[/img]
Every skill listed works! [img]http://i.gyazo.com/1733ce0a736226219334e792e995a334.png[/img]
[b]Some rewritten![/b]
Items up to 474, maps up to 377 w/ clipping, toggleable 317 and 508 features etc.. [img]http://i.gyazo.com/23a5dae2f6ed9014778edbbb3d02a7b8.png[/img]
Reaching 99 in a particular skill gets you perks to continue on with that skill..
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/c738b83f7435bdf4e37ce337c49b1231.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3938ea3f5e0829a5a30bebc88e957fd0.png[/img] A TON of mini-games;
* Pest Control * Fishing Trawler * Custom Assault mini-game * Fight pits w/ Viewing orbs / Fight Caves * Decent Barrows * Slightly Tested Duel Arena
Tons of NPCs Spawned in different dungeons; Misc. Bosses, etc!
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/666aaddf4ab6ed3a409d177cb36f28d3.png[/img]
Wilderness added w/ different locations.
So so much more running out of room for images - I will add more in a moment!
This thread serves as a simple development blog for myself.. Let me know what you think!
Thanks, ~Supaz / Logan

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @ModGage ModGage
item.description:
@ModGage wrote:

Delta will never be forgotten. :palm:

Why just give it away? Just keep it and continue whenever you feel like it

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“supaz, post:13, topic:551110”]I’ve decided to discontinue this. If anyone wants it, I’ll give it to you…

I’ve honestly stuck my hand into to many projects, and this project isn’t a show of my best work. I also want to continue some day but on a much better base.

Thanks for the support,
supaz.[/quote]

I don’t mind you giving away that server, just make sure to keep my wall of fame and stuff out of it I prefer not seeing that released to the public

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“supaz, post:13, topic:551110”]I’ve decided to discontinue this. If anyone wants it, I’ll give it to you…

I’ve honestly stuck my hand into to many projects, and this project isn’t a show of my best work. I also want to continue some day but on a much better base.

Thanks for the support,
supaz.[/quote]

That’s a bummer. This really looked like it could have been one of those unique servers.

I’ve decided to discontinue this. If anyone wants it, I’ll give it to you…

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Fridder:

This looks awesome. The skillcape perks give more of a reason (and make it more enjoyable) to work towards 99 other than bragging rights. Quests with rewards are unique and enjoyable imo. I would definitely play this, the ideas are great.

This, love the skill cape idea and quests. What are the perks for the other capes? As the ones you showed us are very unique.

Read full topic

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

woah i like that skillcape idea. Good job!

Read full topic

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @supaz Supaz
item.description:
@supaz wrote:

Thanks everyone for the continued support! I had no idea you’d like the ideas so much!

A ton of updates, I’ll edit this post in a moment…

Current updates, (a LOT more than i’m going to list… :p)

  • Got a GFX artist to change some things (the background, the music sideicon will now be a “Construction building” icon. - Which is pretty much the construction skill icon enlarged and reshaped.)
  • Repacked a few things into the cache, way to many to full pack. - for now at least.
  • Made the client web client ready.
  • Fixed up some warnings - only 700 to go! …
  • Fixed up some of the fishing trawler code,
  • Got rid of a LOT of the Client.java un needed and won’t be ever needed code.
  • Fixed some networking issues, probably more. I will stress test in a few.
  • Made awesome SMF forums credits to my friend Fabrice. - Awesome profiles, highscores, a portal, shoutbox, players online, etc… All integrated with the server. Also a custom Wall of Fame, and things like that. High scores can be viewed through individuals profiles.
  • Found a flaw in the logging system, fixed.
  • Fixed paths to be able to run on my brand spanking new 6GB RAM VPS! ( Made it Linux Ready p much )

Still going, 2 redbulls later! Re-doing cooking in a moment.

WEB SITE IS ONLINE! PM me for it!

** I am looking for a secondary quest, content, etc developer. This won’t be a paid position… and you’ll get a Server dev rank (forums… Admin in-game) If you’re interested contact me through Skype: LoganGar

That’s all for right now, Going to finish some Pathfinding stuff then move on to re-doing cooking.

Read full topic

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

This looks awesome. The skillcape perks give more of a reason (and make it more enjoyable) to work towards 99 other than bragging rights. Quests with rewards are unique and enjoyable imo. I would definitely play this, the ideas are great.

[/quote]

That’s a really good idea. And I like the simplicity of the perks you gave with it.

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @supaz Supaz
item.description:
@supaz wrote:

lare69:

An anti-dupe system…? You mean packet validation?

Didn’t mean “system” as in validation just yet, but more of just some simple checks, I’m planning on taking further steps to stop duping etc but… for now as this is just a simple project i’m doing (and probably won’t host) I’m not even worried about it.

Read full topic

item.title: A long lost project.. Revived!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

supaz:

Hopefully most where handled, I did implement a anti-dupe system, but we’ll see if I find anymore a long the road.

An anti-dupe system…? You mean packet validation?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @supaz Supaz
item.description:
@supaz wrote:

Years after the release and soon downfall of DeltaScape (the REAL ONE!) It seemed like the legacy was forgotten, the name wiped from memory, the server base files lost for ever…

Little did I know; All along… I had the files. Facepalm This is what many people shun upon, and almost everyone would say… “EW Delta!”

I am not here to prove anyone wrong, or say Delta is the better of the bases available.

I am merely here to revive a once #1 spot server. This includes rewriting the core (even though Delta handled 500+; an auto-restarter etc was used to keep the stability.)

And not only the core; But remastering the content within the base itself.

** for those of you wondering, this is NOT the average un-stable, blank, boring deltascape anymore. **

This base has 19; [YES NINETEEN] quests and more coming when I find the time.

Below are some screenshots: (Don’t mind the “Dodian Evolved” names, it’s what I was going to call it.)

Login Screen:

Some of the options tab; Toggleable between 317 and 508 features, Auto talker, custom GUI w/ other options including x10 hits toggle, transparent interfaces toggle, & New Hotkeys / old Hotkeys.

Good ol’ Yanille; and gameframe:

Decent Clan chat system;

Literally 19 quests and counting!

Custom Construction Portal w/ Joining house interface & Locking / unlocking your portal once inside your house…

Every skill listed works!

Some rewritten!

Items up to 474, maps up to 377 w/ clipping, toggleable 317 and 508 features etc…

Reaching 99 in a particular skill gets you perks to continue on with that skill…



A TON of mini-games;

So so much more running out of room for images - I will add more in a moment!

This thread serves as a simple development blog for myself… Let me know what you think!
